recaptcha_field: the form field name, default g-recaptcha-response
id: some guid representing the form id
name: User friendly name for this form
notify_email: who to notify user's submission to
notify_subject: the subject to notify notify_email with
notify_body: actual mjml template or empty to use fallback/owner.mjml
email_field: identify the email field on the form to send a copy
email_subject: user subject, can be templated like notify_subject
email_body: actual mjml template or empty to use fallback/submitter.mjml
